name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price Cat - Meows when there's a price drop!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You set the Price Drop Alert and we'll email you when the price drops! Simple as

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How to use Price Cat?

To create an alert, please first install this extension. Then navigate to a supported merchant site and look for the Price Cat button on the product page.

Find out supported merchants on https://pricecat.app/support/merchants

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Price Cat meows when there's a price drop,
Just Look For the Price Cat!

- Price Cat lives to find you a deal:

All you need to do is set a Price Cat alert with the right parameters and we'll send you a notification about when that product price drops below your desired price.

- Alerts that never miss a beat:

Setting up an alert with Price Cat is simple and straightforward, and we never miss an alert! 

- Easier than ever before:

With our intuitive UI and easy-to-follow tutorials, setting up alerts has never been easier! Customize your alerts based on your desired price and product.
